posts.title: Lucky Number Slevin
posts.actors: Josh Hartnett, Bruce Willis, Lucy Liu, Morgan Freeman
posts.plot: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss. Slevin is under constant surveillance by relentless Detective Brikowski as well as the infamous assassin Goodkat and finds himself having to hatch his own ingenious plot to get them before they get him.

posts.title: Rear Window
posts.actors: James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey, Thelma Ritter
posts.plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

posts.title: Shutter Island
posts.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley, Max von Sydow
posts.plot: In 1954, a U.S. marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

posts.title: Reservoir Dogs
posts.actors: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn
posts.plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

posts.title: Moneyball
posts.actors: Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Robin Wright
posts.plot: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

posts.title: The Hangover
posts.actors: Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha
posts.plot: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

posts.title: The Great Beauty
posts.actors: Toni Servillo, Carlo Verdone, Sabrina Ferilli, Carlo Buccirosso
posts.plot: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.

posts.title: Mary and Max
posts.actors: Toni Collette, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Barry Humphries, Eric Bana
posts.plot: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.
